subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Anquan Boldin had surgery for a fractured sinus membrane, which required 7 plates and 40 screws to fix, but, remarkably, caused him to miss only two games.
snippet: Anquan Boldin had surgery for a fractured sinus membrane, which required 7 plates and 40 screws to fix, but, remarkably, caused him to miss only two games.
